# Cryptography

> All things cryptography, self-educational & not for production.

---

## [MoonMath](./moonmath/)

<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/sage-271EB5?style=flat-square&logo=data:image/jpeg;base64," alt="sage" />

Exercises & codes from the MoonMath manual to zkSNARKs.

## [ZKHACK](./zkhack/)

<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/rust-F74B01?style=flat-square&logo=rust&logoColor=white" alt="rust" />

Set of puzzles from ZKHACK events.

## [Essentials](./essentials/)

<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/go-black?style=flat-square&logo=go&logoColor=00ADD8" alt="Golang" />

Some essential cryptographic constructs.

## [Cryptopals](./cryptopals/)

<img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/go-black?style=flat-square&logo=go&logoColor=00ADD8" alt="Golang" />

Cryptopals challenges.

---

## Usage

For Sage I use [Conda installation](https://doc.sagemath.org/html/en/installation/conda.html), which can be activated as follows:

```sh
# activate sage environment
conda activate sage
# launch! (might take time at first)
sage
```
